abilities.description: The ability to create powerful earthquakes and shockwaves that can destroy entire structures and split the ground.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Destroys Marine Headquarters
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard uses his Gura Gura no Mi power to unleash a devastating earthquake that splits the entire Marine Headquarters in two.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full world-ending destructive capability of the Gura Gura no Mi, showing why it's considered the strongest Paramecia.

notes: Considered the strongest Paramecia-type Devil Fruit due to its ability to destroy the world.

abilities.description: The ability to create, control, and transform into magma.

keyMoments.title: Akainu Burns Whitebeard's Face
keyMoments.description: Akainu uses his magma powers to severely burn Whitebeard's face and pierce through his torso, demonstrating the deadly heat of his attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even Whitebeard, the World's Strongest Man, can be grievously injured by Akainu's magma.

notes: The magma produced by this fruit can burn even fire, as demonstrated against Ace's Mera Mera no Mi.
